sn51.18:1.1: “Catunnam, bhikkhave, iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta bhikkhu asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
sn51.18:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti,
sn51.18:2.6: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta bhikkhu asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati”ti.
